titles.title: Shawnee Tribe Status Act Amendments Act of 2005
A bill to amend the Shawnee Tribe Status Act of 2000.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

bill.summary: 7/27/2005--Introduced. Shawnee Tribe Status Act Amendments Act of 2005 - Amends the Shawnee Tribe Status Act of 2000 to repeal the requirement that the Secretary of the Interior take into trust for the benefit of the Shawnee Tribe any land within the boundaries of the State of Oklahoma that the Tribe transfers to the Secretary.
